snippet: Philippe Dauman said that a large portion of the viewing of Viacom networks occurs through mobile apps and other platforms that Nielsen does not include.
abstract: Viacom chief executive Philippe Dauman criticizes television research firm Nielsen, noting that large portion of the viewing of Viacom networks occurs through mobile apps and other platforms that Nielsen does not include in its ratings.
lead_paragraph: Philippe Dauman said that a large portion of the viewing of Viacom networks occurs through mobile apps and other platforms that Nielsen does not include.

headline.main: The Chief of Viacom Says Nielsen Is Outdated
headline.print_headline: The Chief of Viacom Says Nielsen Is Outdated
